Name: Bella Donna Daiquiri
Ingredients: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
RIM glass with sugar and cinnamon powder. (Moisten outside edge with lime juice and dip into mix of 1 teaspoon cinnamon powder to ½ cup white sugar.)
Review: Back in 2003, this was the hit cocktail for Difford's Guide staff at the Bellagio, Las Vegas, after working at the Nightclub & Bar Beverage Convention.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2003 at Bellagio in Las Vegas, USA. Whether this cocktail is named after Bella Donna , the 1981 debut solo album by Stevie Nicks, or Atropa belladonna the poisonous plant commonly known as belladonna or deadly nightshade is not recorded.
Nutrition: One serving of Bella Donna Daiquiri contains 289 calories
